summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2874, for the improvement of Railroad Avenue, from the north margin of Madison Street to the south margin of Washington Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 34964 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
